headline.main: A Practitioner of the New Cuisine Is Still Master of the Old

byline.original: By CRAIG CLAIBORNE Special to The New York Times

docs.abstract: Several recipes from kitchen of French chef Michel Guerard; his por (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: EUGENIE-LES-BAINS, France Within a very short span of time, this spa resort has attracted food enthusiasts from all over the world (mostly from the United States) to see what the young French chef, Michel Guerard, hath wrought with what is called la cuisine minceur, or slimming cookery.
